N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7511.1 - Construction and renovation

State Regulations
(a) Correction Law, section 45, subdivision 10, requires that any plans and
specifications for the construction or renovation of detention facilities must
be submitted for review to the State Commission of Correction. (b) Approval of the commission must be
obtained before a construction or renovation project is advertised for bids. If
it is not contemplated that a bidding procedure is to be followed, approval
must be obtained before any construction or renovation is undertaken. (c) A booklet which contains outline data and
general requirements to be observed in the construction or renovation of city, town and village detention facilities is available and will be provided on
request to the commission office at Albany. Notes
